attributes.action: require that all MPs read the book "1984" written by Eric Arthur Blair (George Orwell) and pass a simple written test.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As it appears nobody in parliament is aware of the dangers of an oppressive, police state, all MPs should be required to read the book "1984" and pass a simple written test to demonstrate that they understand the themes of the book and how they apply to the current panic about largely unfounded security concerns.
